name: iamlookingforvintage
description: Vintage clothing website with content management

scripts.build: npm run build:tinacms || npm run build:static
scripts.build:static: echo 'TinaCMS schema configured - ready for cloud connection. Building static version.' && mkdir -p admin && echo 'TinaCMS will be available once cloud connection is established.' > admin/index.html

author: iamlookingforvintage
